verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And He walks with me, newline And He talks with me, newline And He tells me I am His own; newline And the joy we share as we tarry there, newline None other has ever known.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I come to the garden alone, newline While the dew is still on the roses; newline And the voice I hear, falling on my ear, newline The Son of God discloses.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He speaks, and the sound of newline His voice is so sweet, newline The birds hush their singing, newline And the melody that He gave to me, newline Within my heart is ringing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I'd stay in the garden with Him, newline Though the night around me be falling, newline But He bids me go; newline Through the voice of woe, newline His voice to me is calling.
